Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_stream_volume

The function AIL_stream_volume returns the current stream volume, from 0 (minimum) to 127 (maximum).

S32 AIL_stream_volume(
  HSTREAM stream
);

In Parameters

stream
indicates the stream handle whose volume is to be returned.

Returns

The stream's current volume value.

Discussion

See AIL_set_stream_volume for more information.


Group: Digital Audio Streaming Services
Related Functions: AIL_set_stream_reverb, AIL_set_stream_volume, AIL_stream_pan, AIL_stream_reverb
Related Basic Types: HSTREAM, S32
